title: 8th Sem
content: If we fail to get an internship in 8th sem, we have to pick up three special topics to cover up th credits. I wanted to what special topics will be available, will they be taught by PESU staff/DIS courses and if any seniors have done this can you please share your experience.

comments.body: Usually the pool of special topics remains the same every year. Check last year's available courses to see what's available. And yeah, people do this, so don't feel weird about it lol.
Is the poll of special topics same as those of 7th sem?
